title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála 

Teanga Ghaeltachta a Ainmniú) (Uimh. 2), 2022 a ghairm den Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 feadfar tordu um acht na gaeltachta 2012 (limisteir pleanala teanga ghaeltachta ainmniu) (uimh 2) 2022 ghairm den ordu seo

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. Tá na limistéir a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar
text_raw:
2. Tá na limistéir a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar 
Pleanála Teanga Ghaeltachta chun críocha alt 7(2) d’Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 
(Uimh. 34 de 2012). 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 6 Meán Fómhair, 2022, 
á rá go ndearnadh an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [432] 3 

Limistéar Pleanála Teanga: Maigh Eo Thiar, Co. Mhaigh Eo 

SCEIDEAL 

(1) Na limistéir toghroinne i gContae Mhaigh Eo seo a leanas: Acaill, An 

Corrán agus Dumha Éige. 

Arna thabhairt faoi mo láimh,, 
 25 Lúnasa 2022 

JACK CHAMBERS, 
 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, 

Spóirt agus Meán 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [432] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 432 of 2022 

________________ 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 2) ORDER 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [432] 5 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 432 of 2022 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 2) ORDER 2022 

I, JACK CHAMBERS, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 
section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted by the 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department and Title 
of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 
(S.I. No. 547 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
text_norm: 2 ta na limisteir shonraitear sa sceideal ainmnithe mar limistear pleanala teanga ghaeltachta chun criocha alt 7(2) acht na gaeltachta 2012 (uimh 34 de 2012) foilsiodh fogra san iris oifigiuil 6 mean fomhair 2022 ra go ndearnadh ionstraim reachtuil seo 432 3 limistear pleanala teanga maigh eo thiar co mhaigh eo sceideal (1) na limisteir toghroinne gcontae mhaigh eo seo leanas acaill corran agus dumha eige arna thabhairt faoi mo laimh 25 lunasa 2022 jack chamber aire stait ag roinn turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean 4 432 official translation tiontu oifigiuil statutory instrument s.i no 432 2022 gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 2) order 2022 432 5 official translation tiontu oifigiuil s.i no 432 2022 gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 2) order 2022 jack chamber minister state department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium exercise power conferred section 7(2) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) (as adapted culture heritage gaeltacht (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (s.i no 403 2020)) tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020 (s.i no 547 2020) hereby order follows

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of 

Gaeltacht Language Planning Areas) (No.2) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no.2) order 2022

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. The areas specified in the Schedule are designated to be a Gaeltacht
text_raw:
2. The areas specified in the Schedule are designated to be a Gaeltacht 
Language Planning Area for the purposes of section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 
2012 (No. 34 of 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [432] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

Language Planning Area: Maigh Eo Thiar, Co. Mayo
text_norm: 2 area specified schedule designated gaeltacht language planning area purpose section 7(2) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 6th september 2022 6 432 official translation tiontu oifigiuil language planning area maigh eo thiar co mayo

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: (1) The following electoral division areas in County Mayo: Acaill, An
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

(1) The following electoral division areas in County Mayo: Acaill, An 

Corrán and Dumha Éige.

 25 August 2022 

JACK CHAMBERS,
